content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the most recent information or specific details about partnerships initiated by Mackie in the past or present. However, based on the available information, Mackie has collaborated with various organizations in the music industry, including the Musician's Emergency Healthcare Fund (MEH), which supports artists in need of medical assistance. Additionally, the company has teamed up with the Pablove Foundation, which seeks to improve the quality of life for children living with cancer. Moreover, Mackie has sponsored and supported various concerts, charity events, and fundraisers over the years.
